snippet: The Institute for Supply Management said its manufacturing index rose to 51.8 last month from 49.5 in February. Any reading above 50 signals growth.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its manufacturing index rose to 51.8 in March from 49.5 in February; expansion follows five months of declines.
lead_paragraph: The Institute for Supply Management said its manufacturing index rose to 51.8 last month from 49.5 in February. Any reading above 50 signals growth.

headline.main: Manufacturing Expands, Ending Five Months of Decline
headline.print_headline: Manufacturing Expands After 5 Months of Decline
